allow: Bash(for entity in cart order payment product review user)

Bash(jq -r 'if .success then """"✅ SUCCESS - Path: \(.metadata.generation_path) | Records: \(.record_count) | Time: \(.metadata.generation_time_ms)ms"""" else """"❌ FAILED - \(.error)"""" end' echo "" done)
Bash(npx shadcn@latest add button input select textarea card badge tabs checkbox tooltip dialog dropdown-menu separator scroll-area label)
Bash(npx shadcn-ui@latest add switch slider select tabs tooltip table progress alert -y)
Bash(npx shadcn@latest add switch slider select tabs tooltip table progress alert)
